H0.text: The UEFA (Union of European Football Associations) was founded in which European country in 1954. France

H1.text: The UEFA (Union of European Football Associations) was founded in which European country in 1954. Belgium

H2.text: The UEFA (Union of European Football Associations) was founded in which European country in 1954. Italy

H3.text: The UEFA (Union of European Football Associations) was founded in which European country in 1954. Suiza

A4.text: UEFA was officially inaugurated on 15 June 1954 in Basel, Switzerland, after consultation between the Italian, French, and Belgian associations.
